CustomField.description: A formula field to convert the Positions field value to a number. If the Positions field value is "Unlimited" this field value will be -1.
CustomField.formula: CASE( Positions__c, 'Unlimited', -1, 'Up to 1', 1, 'Up to 2', 2, 'Up to 3', 3, 'Up to 4', 4, 'Up to 5', 5, 'Up to 6', 6, 'Up to 7', 7, -1 )
CustomField.label: Number Of Max Positions
